alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 9:23AM EDT until March 26 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN EDGEFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN AIKEN COUNTIES... At 923 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belvedere, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Aiken Mall, Clearwater, Belvedere, New Ellenton, USC Aiken, Edgefield County Airport, Aiken Municipal Airport, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Graniteville, Aiken State Park, Burnettown, Trenton, Windsor, Poverty Hill, Vaucluse, Riverside Village at Hammond`s Ferry and Stevens Creek Public Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 1 and 27. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
